Reviews.Title: Poor 3D. Buy a 3D tv instead
Reviews.Author: Andrew Bloch
Reviews.Content: Don't buy this viewer.  Put the money towards a 3D TV instead.  The resolution is rather low, and when viewing pictures in 3D, the resolution to each eye is cut in half.  There is also a significant amount of "ghosting" or "cross-talk" between the right and left images.  The navigation and controls are also a little show and awkward.  I'd rather view the pictures in the small viewer in a FinePix REAL 3D W3 camera, or on a 3D TV.3D TVs are now widely available and not too expensive, so you'd probably be better off saving the money and buying one of those instead.

Reviews.Title: Not even close !!!
Reviews.Author: Richard Huizinga
Reviews.Content: I bought this after buying the 3d camara (which is great) and expected the same quality of screen.but it is not even close.the images are hard to put in focus and the manual was in Japanese, I had to download the english version.The shipping was done extremely fast, but the product is BAD

Reviews.Title: Great 3D Viewer without needing glasses!
Reviews.Author: jmh
Reviews.Content: It works great. The image is almost as good as the cameras viewfinder. We are really happy with it. It iis much better than showing friends this great technology on a camera screen! Highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: not useful
Reviews.Author: wolf "wolf"
Reviews.Content: It was shown on fujifilms website as an accessory to the Fujifilm W3 3D camera. I have not yet, after a few hundred hours of trying to reformat into something this device can use, vbeen able to have it play 3d, or even 2 d video. There are devices out there for less than $200 that can do this.

Reviews.Title: Discontinued
Reviews.Author: BPCisMe "BPCisMe"
Reviews.Content: As of 1-19-11, Fuji's website shows this 3D viewer as being discontinued. Hopefully, they will come out with a comparable one at a MUCH better price. $1200.00 was too ridiculous!

Reviews.Title: Fuji V1 3D Viewer
Reviews.Author: Thomas88
Reviews.Content: Seems a little pricey from the USA.Has anyone tried buying; via AMAZON of course,from Japan.Thomas88 UK

Reviews.Title: Amazon, You are crazy for letting anyone post a item 2.5x the price compared to anywhere else
Reviews.Author: SmartConsumer
Reviews.Content: Amazon, You are crazy for letting anyone post a item 250% more expensive compared to anywhere else! $1300?! are you kidding me?!
